name: Joseph
description: Dreamer sold by brothers, rose to rule Egypt. Coat of many colors, interpreter of dreams, saved his family. From pit to palace.

revealing-identity.name: I Am Joseph
revealing-identity.description: The dramatic reveal to his brothers
revealing-identity.prompt: standing with arms open in emotional revelation - 'I am Joseph!', tears visible, brothers shocked before him, the moment of reunion after years of separation

coat-of-colors.name: Wearing the Coat
coat-of-colors.description: Young Joseph in his colorful coat
coat-of-colors.prompt: young man wearing beautiful multi-colored coat - proud but innocent, father's favorite, unaware of brothers' jealousy growing, dreamer in his glory

interpreting-pharaoh.name: Before Pharaoh
interpreting-pharaoh.prompt: standing before Pharaoh explaining dreams - gesturing as he interprets, confident bearing, prisoner becoming advisor, seven years of plenty and famine revealed

ruling-egypt.name: Second in Command
ruling-egypt.prompt: standing in Egyptian royal garments and gold chain - signet ring, second only to Pharaoh, the slave who became ruler, overseeing grain distribution

resisting-temptation.name: Fleeing Temptation
resisting-temptation.prompt: turning away or running from reaching hands - leaving garment behind, choosing prison over sin, integrity that cost him but defined him

forgiving-brothers.name: Forgiving His Brothers
forgiving-brothers.prompt: embracing weeping brothers - 'God meant it for good', forgiving those who tried to destroy him, redemptive love conquering betrayal
